data.title: Epistolae: Genealogy: Mieszko
data.meta_description:
Table 2.2: Descendants of Henry I of Germany: Line of Richeza of Lotharingia and Mieszko II of PolandMieszko II Lambert king of Poland b. Cir 990, d. 1034
+Richeza of Lotharingia d. 1063

|   |---Ladislaus I king of Hungary b. 1040, d. 1095

|   |   |---Prisa/Irene of Hungary |   |       +John II Comnenus emperor of Byzantium |   |---Geza I king of Hungary b.
